CustomField.description: Challenge Member status. When "Accomplished", the Challenge Reward meets its "Logical expression" and can be granted. When "Not Accomplished", a "Mission with Objective" was not attained and the Challenge Reward cannot be granted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Challenge Member status. When "Accomplished", the Challenge Reward meets its "Logical expression" and can be granted. When "Not Accomplished", a "Mission with Objective" was not attained and the Challenge Reward cannot be granted.
CustomField.label: Status
